text: Ko Zieleman (1933â€“2021) was a Dutch bicycle racer and bicycle builder. He assembled custom bike frames. He was born on 10 January 1933 in Amsterdam. In 1959, he raced from Gent to Wevelgem . He had a bike shop in Ansterdam. His grandson is Dylan Groenewegen. == References == Category:1933 births Category:Dutch cyclists Category:2021 deaths
title: Ko Zieleman
